Fraoula Tech Private Limited.title: Fraoula Tech launches AI-powered chatbot for healthcare
Fraoula Tech Private Limited.description: Fraoula Tech Private Limited has unveiled a new AI chatbot designed to assist patients with medical queries in regional languages.

Mapeit Technologies.title: Mapeit partners with government for rural digital infrastructure
Mapeit Technologies.description: Mapeit Technologies has signed an MoU to deploy digital solutions in rural areas, boosting e-governance and connectivity.

Zenith Agro India.title: Zenith Agro innovates sustainable farming with smart sensors
Zenith Agro India.description: Zenith Agro India introduces smart sensor systems to monitor soil health and reduce water usage across farms in Maharashtra.
